name: planner-copy-planner-plan
title: Copy Planner plan
shortDescription: With this sample, you can copy an existing plan to a certain group.
longDescription: With this sample, you can copy an existing Planner plan to a specific group. This script will create a new plan with the same name and copy all buckets and tasks.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample copy Planner plan

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
